title: Lol Lucian...
body: Lucian is that one champion that gets buffed and nerf'd back and forth throughout the year. lmao

replies.body: Riot doesn't like black men. ONLY COOL ASIAN  RACIST STEREOTYPE NINJA HASAGI DUUN YEGEDUUUN  UHUHUHU EKUUUUUU MAFACKAS
